text: This block returns specified candle value for given candle. Each candle has open price, close price, high price, low price, and open time.
This block requires a candle as an input parameter.
In the below example an open price is extracted from a candle into variable candle_open_price. The Candle data is provided by another block (Get candle).
In the above example it is assumed that variable candle_open_price is processed somewhere within other blocks.
